actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held prior to introduction and/or referral. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-257.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973, to authorize a supplemental appropriation for fiscal year 1983 and to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1984 and 1985.
short_title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1983, 1984, and 1985

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal years 1983, 1984, and 1985 - Authorizes appropriations for the Board for International Broadcasting for FY 1983, 1984, and 1985.

titles.title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1983, 1984, and 1985
A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973, to authorize a supplemental appropriation for fiscal year 1983 and to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1984 and 1985.
